医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
Medicare阿片类药物安全政策显示出最初的成功，但有效性随着时间的推移而降低了关键。哈佛大学朝圣者医疗保健研究所的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，2019年的Medicare阿片类药物安全政策显示，阿片类药物处方最初减少了高风险人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/medicare-opioid-safety-safety-policy-safety-shows-initial-success-success-uccescess-uccescess-cucces-diminishes-diminishes-over-over-over time-key-po.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/medicare-opioid-safety-safety-policy-safety-safety-shows-initial-success-uccescess-uccescess-uccescess-succesces-diminishes-viminishes-over-over-over-poy-poy-key-key-po.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A016EC8-8381-454A-860A-860A-2A25A25AEF7C07E Mon, 10 Feb 2025 21:45:29 -0500 Medicare opioid safety policy shows initial success but effectiveness diminishes over time Key Po...
与肾脏并发症有关的月经杯的位置不佳医生在BMJ病例报告中警告说，一个月经流动的月经杯可能会导致比单独泄漏更严重的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/poor-positioning-of-menstrual-cup-cup-cup-cup-cup-cup-to-kidney-complectation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/poor-positioning-of-menstrual-cup-cup-cup-cup-cup-cup-to-kidney-complecations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7A26E634-1DE2-494A-B609-CF4981756C38 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 21:14:28 -0500 Poor positioning of menstrual cup linked to kidney complications
万古霉素可以为患有炎症性肠病的患者提供新的治疗选择一项新研究发现，一种用于治疗感染性腹泻的抗生素可能是一种有效的炎症性肠病疾病的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/Vancomycin-could-offer-new-therapeutic-option-for-patients-with-a-type-of-inflammatory-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/Vancomycin-could-could-offer-offer-new-therapeutic-therapeutic-option-for-patients-with-a-a-type of Inflammatoration-bowel-bowel-bowel-bowel-bowel-bowel-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B46CBB7-3952-48E8-B0D3-C53858C60A09 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 21:10:43 -0500 Vancomycin could offer new therapeutic option for patients with a type of inflammatory bowel disease
研究阐明了额颞痴呆的诊断挑战昆士兰州大学的研究人员发现，近70％的可疑额颞痴呆患者最终没有这种疾病，这是一项旨在识别导致这种臭名昭著的难以诊断疾病的因素的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/study-sheds-light-on-on-diarostic-challenges-challenges-in-frontotempormoral-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/study-sheds-light-on-on-diarostic-challenges-challenges-in-frontotempormoral-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29b65fd0-ecf5-429f-8673-f4af4afa67b3222b Mon, 10 Feb 2025 21:05:46 -0500 Study sheds light on diagnostic challenges in frontotemporal dementia
新的遗传图为肾脏疾病的更精确诊断和治疗提供了希望根据宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的研究人员发表的一项新研究，一项在科学上发表的新研究可能是肾脏疾病患者的1000多个基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-genetic-map-offers-hope-for-more-more-presise-diarosise-diarosis-diarosise-and-wareatment-of-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-genetic-map-offers-hope-for-for-more-presise-diarsis-diarosis-diarosis--diareatment-of-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d477Cee-8DC4-4F21-A9CA-1EE0753AFB17 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 21:02:04 -0500 New genetic map offers hope for more precise diagnosis and treatment of kidney disease
突破性研究确定了在早期阶段解决阿尔茨海默氏症的新方法来自USC凯克医学院的一组研究人员释放了触发细胞炎症和衰老的细胞途径的细节，并与阿尔茨海默氏病有关，尤其是在承受APOE4遗传风险的人中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/breakthrough-study-indifies-new-way-way-to-address-alzheimers-at-ap-ap apages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/breakthrough-study-indifies-new-way-way-to-address-alzheimers-at-ap-apx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d55524029-bf1d-4808-9d46-446-445e1b5b0d28 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 20:58:00 -0500 Breakthrough study identifies new way to address Alzheimer's at early stages
流感病毒改变形状以逃避免疫反应根据美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）科学家的一项新研究，流感病毒颗粒从策略上适应其形状变成球体或更大的细丝，以偏爱它们根据环境条件感染细胞的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/influenza-a-a-virus-changes-hanges-hape-to-evade-evade-mmmune-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/influenza-a-a-virus-changes-hanges-hape-to-woade-evade-evade-mmmune-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a6fefa1-473A-435A-435A-9476-0E624182F91F Mon, 10 Feb 2025 20:53:41 -0500 Influenza A virus changes shape to evade immune responses
新的深度学习方法可以彻底改变心脏健康监测冠状动脉疾病是全球死亡的主要原因。单光子发射计算机断层扫描（SPECT）的最常见工具之一，用于诊断和监测心脏病，心肌灌注成像（MPI），使用放射性示踪剂和特殊相机来提供血液流向心脏的详细图像，帮助医生检测冠状动脉疾病和其他心血管异常。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-deep-learning-method-could-could-revolutions-heart-health-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-deep-learning-method-could-revolutions-heart-health-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c93b0669-be67-be67-49ad-a37f-95EE50C1CBB9 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 20:48:00 -0500 New deep learning method could revolutionize heart health monitoring
Bimagrumab可以减少使用减肥药的人的骨质疏松症风险减肥药物席卷了世界，并帮助了许多超重的人。但是对于某些人来说，体重减轻也会导致肌肉质量损失，并可能导致骨质疏松症的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/bimagrumab-could-reduce-osteoporisos--risk-ink-in-people------in--in-people-------in--in-people-- in-used-weight-weight-loss-medication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/bimagrumab-could-reduce-osteoporisos-risk-risk-ink-in-people-------in--in-people-------in--in-people-saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=574dee73-1483-4765-8bf2-2185e20f555555c9 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 20:45:03 -0500 Bimagrumab could reduce osteoporosis risk in people using weight loss medication
高胆固醇饮食会增加美国退伍军人心脏病发作风险，研究警告较高的饮食胆固醇摄入量与美国退伍军人中心肌梗塞的风险增加有关，从而增强了对心脏健康饮食选择的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/high-cholesterol-diets-increase-nert-atchack-risk-inc-risk-in--us-us-us-veterans-study-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/high-cholesterol-diets-increase-necrease-hend-warns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96905ede-6106-438f-8354-D3A54B02F9C3 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 20:44:00 -0500 High cholesterol diets increase heart attack risk in U.S. veterans, study warns
